casebody.data:
James TOWNSEND and Lucretia Townsend
v.
N.C. DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION No. 21P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2017 Lisa G. Godfrey, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Mark C. Tanenbaum, Attorney at Law, for Townsend, James, et al. Melody R. Hairston, Special Deputy Attorney General, for N.C. Department of Transportation

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 12th of January 2017 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."
